description: DNA digestion enzymes like HindIII or DNaseI
title: Enzyme

___name.description: The name of the digestion enzyme.
___name.title: Enzyme Name

___description.description: A plain text description of the enzyme.
___description.title: Description

___site_length.internal_comment: this can be calculated if a recognition sequence is provided but can be set even without recognition sequence
___site_length.description: The length of the enzyme recognition sequence.
___site_length.title: Site Length

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the construct.
___url.title: URL

___cut_position.internal_comment: has a dependency on either cut_sequence or site_length
___cut_position.description: The position in the provided recognition sequence at which the enzyme cuts AFTER - relative to base 1 of site.
___cut_position.title: Cut position

___recognition_sequence.description: The bases of the enzyme recognition sequence.
___recognition_sequence.title: Recognition Sequence

___enzyme_source.description: The Lab or Vendor that provided the enzyme.
___enzyme_source.title: Enzyme Source

___catalog_number.description: A plain text for catalog description.
___catalog_number.title: Product Catalog Number
